description:
During Eiichiro’s first day of practice, Alex, a professional player, refuses to have a match with him.  However, another professional player, Ike Souji, declares that he will play a match against anyone who can beat Eiichiro.  Thanks to this, Alex and many other players end up playing against Eiichiro.  While dealing with the weight of ball, Eiichiro uses his special control skill but is still unable to win.
